articles.author: Nadine Schmidt and Stephanie Halasz, CNN
articles.title: Austria announces Europe's first nationwide vaccine mandate and reimposes lockdown as Covid-19 soars - CNN
articles.description: Austria is going back into a national lockdown and plans to become the first country in Europe to make Covid-19 vaccinations mandatory for all eligible people as the nation's coronavirus crisis deepens, Chancellor Alexander Schallenberg announced Friday.
